title: UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, Professional Flash Non Toxic Safe Tattoo Halloween FX Party Artist Fancy Makeup Painting Kit For Kids and Adult
descriptions:
UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette

Create bold, brilliant looks for any occasion with the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette. This professional makeup painting kit packs 20 intensely pigmented, creamy colors into a sturdy, convenient plastic case—perfect for face and body artistry, from Halloween transformations and cosplay to stage performances and festivals.

Key features:
- 20-color pro palette: Includes flash and Aqua shades with crowd-favorite tones like gold, silver, pink, purple, red, yellow, blue, green, brown, black, and white for limitless mixing and creativity.
- High-performance formula: Oil-based, creamy texture with color-saturated coverage that blends easily, dries quickly, and sets to a smudge-proof, crack-resistant finish with minimal rub-off.
- Skin-friendly and safe: Non-toxic and gentle on skin, designed for both kids and adults.
- Comfortable, durable wear: Flexible, vibrant color that feels comfortable for hours—ideal for long events, stage lights, and active parties.
- Easy application: Applies smoothly with sponge or brush; great for both beginners and pros.
- Simple removal: Cleans off with olive oil or a professional waterproof makeup remover.

What you can create:
- Artistic makeup and bold body art
- Special FX coloring like bruises, blood, and fantasy textures
- Cosplay, crowns, costume accents, and character looks

Perfect for:
- Halloween, SFX makeup, and theme parties
- Festivals, carnivals, birthday parties, and campfires
- Stage and performance makeup for reliable, high-impact color

What’s in the box:
- UCANBE Athena 20-Color Face & Body Paint Oil Palette in a sturdy plastic case

Pro tip:
Start with a clean, dry base. Use a damp sponge for broader coverage and a fine brush for detailing. Set with a light translucent powder if desired for extra longevity, and remove gently with oil-based remover at the end of the day.

Turn your imagination into wearable art with UCANBE Athena—vibrant color, pro results, and comfortable, all-day wear made easy.
